summary: Add a new 'Map' button (2D logo) next to the 'Flying' button in the travelogue; button is present but has no functionality/content yet.

existing_features.title: In the Travelogue UI, add a new button labeled "Map" positioned immediately to the right of the existing "Flying" button wherever the Flying button is rendered (i.e., within each journey card’s action controls). The Map button must display a clear "2D" logo/icon (text-based is acceptable, e.g., a compact “2D” mark) alongside the "Map" label.

Ensure the new "Map" button is a no-op placeholder: clicking/tapping it must not navigate, open dialogs, trigger toasts, call backend APIs, or otherwise change application state or UI beyond standard button press visuals.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a 'Map' button with a 2D logo next to the 'Flying' button in the travelogue; no action/content yet when tapped.

projectName: Add placeholder Map (2D) button next to Flying in Travelogue
